name: Dice Defense (Green Acorn Studios)
description:
Dice Defense is a 3D tower defense game, with deck-building elements and a large variety of towers. 

At the start of the game, the dice decide which buildings you can use to defend the kingdom. 

Fight waves of enemies successfully to encounter their boss and keep your castle standing!

Gameplay:

- Use more than 10 different towers and explore their combinations, strengths, and weaknesses
- Fight many waves of diverse enemies from tiny foot soldiers, to flying airships while enjoying adaptive soundtracks.
- No need to read a lengthy description, as controls are explained in an in-game tutorial.

Additional Hints:
- F1 to toggle Fullscreen

Download on Google Play:

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.greenacorn.gmtk2022

This project started as an entry for the GMTK game jam in 2022 but quickly developed into a larger project, the most ambitious Green Acorn production so far.
